Articles.Content:
Hello!

Once in a while I see threads with "PSA" in the title. What does it mean?
So it's similar to "FYI". Ok, thanks! My question is answered. :)

As "Charfa" said or in the context of this forum nothing more then a fad, or subject line fluff as it can be removed and have no effect.
And as such someday it shall pass like all fads.

Post in Suitable Area of the forums ;)

Moving!
Pretty ---- Advice. You can insert the missing four-letter word.
[B]P[/B]lease shut up everyone, i have [B]S[/B]omething [B]A[/B]nnoying to tell you that isn't really important, and you probably already know.
'PSA' means "prostate-specific antigen", as in a PSA Blood Test. Once you hit 50+ years old, acronyms as such take on a whole new meaning lol.
PSA mainly means Public Safety Announcement lol
Well, it's also one of [B]Jeb's[/B] favorite [I]phrases[/I] - [I][B]P[/B]lease [B]S[/B]tand [B]A[/B]side![/I]
Isn't it obvious? It means "Potential Silliness Arena."
